quotes.message: I used to work in a funeral home to feel good about myself, just the fact that I was breathing.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: If a great outfit gets you one step closer to feeling good about yourself, then it's worth every penny.
quotes.name: Rachel Roy

quotes.message: Eliminating the things you love is not wellness. Wellness feeds your soul and makes you feel good.
quotes.name: Iman

quotes.message: There is nothing that works out for the worst that won't work out for the better.
quotes.name: Karldon Okruta

quotes.message: Real beauty is to be true to oneself. That's what makes me feel good.
quotes.name: Laetitia Casta

quotes.message: I know only that what is moral is what you feel good after and what is immoral is what you feel bad after.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: When you're feeling your worst, that's when you get to know yourself the best.
quotes.name: Leslie Grossman

quotes.message: Hard work makes you feel good because you have accomplished something.
quotes.name: Alcurtis Turner

quotes.message: People who produce good results feel good about themselves.
quotes.name: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.message: When you look good, you feel good. Confidence with what you're wearing is very important. If you feel good, you will always perform your best without worrying about anything.
quotes.name: Maria Sharapova

quotes.message: The best feeling in the world is realizing that you're perfectly happy without the thing you thought you needed.
quotes.name: Marxie

quotes.message: If you know that all is well, you know all you need to know. And if you know life is supposed to be fun, you know more than almost anybody else knows.
quotes.name: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.message: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to swim.
quotes.name: Jon Kabat Zinn

quotes.message: Laughter is the sensation of feeling good all over and showing it principally in one place.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Just do your best. I find that if I set that goal for myself and no one else, I feel good.
quotes.name: Cobie Smulders

quotes.message: I feel pretty good. My body actually looks like an old banana, but it's fine.
quotes.name: Mike Piazza

quotes.message: Laugh at yourself. It tones your facial muscles and attitude.
quotes.name: Kelly Rudolph

quotes.message: Follow what feels good in the moment, every moment, and it will lead you through a most excellent life.
quotes.name: Jen Sincero

quotes.message: As you think thoughts that feel good to you, you will be in harmony with who you really are.
quotes.name: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.message: Giving back, doing motivational speeches and stuff like that, that's always made me feel good. If you repeatedly go out there, and you are the change that you want to see, then that's what you are.
quotes.name: Keke Palmer

quotes.message: If we are always pushing away from feelings that we condemn as wrong, painful, or ugly, we are also pushing away from the very energy that can bring us incredible joy and ecstasy.
quotes.name: Shaeri Richards

quotes.message: Feeling good about ourselves is essential in our being able to love others.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: See with the eyes of love and a thing becomes beautiful. See with the eyes of hate and things are ugly.
quotes.name: Joy Cowley

quotes.message: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Even if happiness forgets you a little bit, never completely forget about it.
quotes.name: Jacques Prevert

quotes.message: Those who can laugh without cause have either found the true meaning of happiness or have gone stark raving mad.
quotes.name: Norm Papernick

quotes.message: Your dreams don't have to be lofty; they just have to be lived.
quotes.name: Kelly Bouchard

quotes.message: To feel good, do good.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Be thankful for what you have and you will end up having more.
quotes.name: Oprah

quotes.message: I'm not about trying to get and get and get. I feel good when I get, but I kind of feel better when I give.
quotes.name: K'naan

quotes.message: Just try to do the right thing, and that's immediate karma: I feel good about myself.
quotes.name: Linda Thompson

quotes.message: It's always a nice day above the clouds.
quotes.name: James Stoddah

quotes.message: The better you feel, the more in alignment you are. The worse you feel the more out of alignment you are.
quotes.name: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.message: Being happy doesn't mean you're perfect. It just means you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
quotes.name: K.B Indiana

quotes.message: The next time you feel really good, just keep feeling that way for the rest of your life.
quotes.name: Donny Miller

quotes.message: If you're happy, if you're feeling good, then nothing else matters.
quotes.name: Robin Wright Penn

quotes.message: Mining the moment for something that feels good, something to appreciate, something to savour, something to take in, that's what your moments are about.
quotes.name: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.message: When you take care of yourself, you're a better person for others. When you feel good about yourself, you treat others better.
quotes.name: Solange Knowles

quotes.message: Always remember you are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, smarter than you think and twice as beautiful as you've ever imagined.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: It's your life; live it well.
quotes.name: Judge Judy Sheindlin

quotes.message: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
quotes.name: John Barrymore

quotes.message: Life is full of challenges, seen and unseen, so to look and feel great, you must hold your head up each day and project your inner confidence.
quotes.name: Cindy Ann Peterson

quotes.message: God brings men into deep waters, not to drown them, but to cleanse them.
quotes.name: John Aughey

quotes.message: I will always find a way and a way will always find me.
quotes.name: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.message: Don't water your weeds.
quotes.name: Harvey Mackay

quotes.message: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: Our capacity to draw happiness from aesthetic objects or material goods in fact seems critically dependent on our first satisfying a more important range of emotional or psychological needs, among them the need for understanding, for love, expression and respect.
quotes.name: Alain De Botton

quotes.message: Learn to value yourself, which means: fight for your happiness.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift; that’s why it’s called The Present.
quotes.name: Bil Keane

quotes.message: Put your thoughts to sleep. Do not let them cast a shadow over the moon of your heart. Let go of thinking.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Take a deep breath. Inhale peace, exhale happiness.
quotes.name: A.D. Posey

quotes.message: Life is the dancer and you are the dance.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched, they are felt with the heart.
quotes.name: The Little Prince

quotes.message: The world is full of magical things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
quotes.name: W.B. Yeats

quotes.message: There’s as many atoms in a single molecule of your DNA as there are stars in the typical galaxy. We are, each of us, a little universe.
quotes.name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.message: See what no one else sees. See what everyone chooses not to see – out of fear, conformity or laziness.
quotes.name: Patch Adams

quotes.message: Wherever you are, you are one with the clouds and one with the sun and the stars you see. You are one with everything.
quotes.name: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.message: Nature does not hurry, yet everything gets accomplished.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Each morning when I open my eyes I say to myself: I, not events, have the power to make me happy or unhappy today. I can choose which it shall be. Yesterday is dead, tomorrow hasn’t arrived yet. I have just one day, today, and I’m going to be happy in it.
quotes.name: Groucho Marx

quotes.message: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Men are made stronger on realization that the helping hand they need is at the end of their own arm.
quotes.name: Sidney J. Phillips

quotes.message: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.name: J. K. Rowling

quotes.message: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
quotes.name: Walter Hagen

quotes.message: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing and be nothing.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: You can't get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.
quotes.name: Jerry West

quotes.message: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The free soul is rare, but you know it when you see it - basically because you feel good, very good, when you are near or with them.
quotes.name: Charles Bukowski

quotes.message: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Those who matter don't mind, and those who mind don't matter.
quotes.name: Bernard Baruch

quotes.message: Genius is more often found in a cracked pot than in a whole one.
quotes.name: E. B. White

quotes.message: When I feel good about myself, things start happening for myself. When you look up, you go up.
quotes.name: Herschel Walker

quotes.message: The culture we have does not make people feel good about themselves. And you have to be strong enough to say if the culture doesn't work, don't buy it.
quotes.name: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.message: It sounds like a cliche but I also learnt that you're not going to fall for the right person until you really love yourself and feel good about how you are.
quotes.name: Emma Watson

quotes.message: We don't laugh because we feel good; we feel good because we laugh.
quotes.name: Bob Ross

quotes.message: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Life's too short to pretend and play games like that. I want to spend my time hanging out with people who make me feel good about myself. People who make me happy.
quotes.name: Gena Showalter

quotes.message: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: If you want to be happy, do not dwell on the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
quotes.name: Anthony J. D’Angelo

quotes.message: Nothing ever goes away until it teaches us what we need to know.
quotes.name: Pema Chodron

quotes.message: Happiness is a habit - cultivate it.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quotes.name: Anne Frank

quotes.message: Music is music, ultimately. If it makes you feel good, cool.
quotes.name: Prince

quotes.message: The audience likes their emotions to be touched. They want to laugh and cry and feel good.
quotes.name: Magic Johnson

quotes.message: Kindness makes a fellow feel good whether it's being done to him or by him.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: The true secret of happiness lies in the taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
quotes.name: William Morris

quotes.message: As people spin faster and faster in the pursuit of merely personal happiness, they become exhausted in the futile effort of chasing themselves.
quotes.name: Andrew Delbanco

quotes.message: Happiness is not an ideal of reason, but of imagination.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Everything real is in the present moment. Only here can we find happiness and harmony, feel alive and do something that will change our future. Only here can we be with the people we love, enjoy the things we like and see beautiful places.
quotes.name: Lidiya K.
